sense.name: the act of having sex
sense.examples: The man described his relationship with her as a few good fucks.

sense.name: vulgar term for a sexual partner
sense.examples: The hooker told him she was a better fuck than the other women on the street.

sense.name: a vague measurement or unit of concern or interest
sense.commentary: FUCK[+quantity][+unit][+vague][+of_concern] Note: usually in the expression 'give a fuck'
sense.examples: He doesn't give a fuck about anyone but himself. John actually appears to give a fuck about the success of our project. She doesn't give three fucks for what other people think of her clothing style.
